name: Fruit World Splash
description:
Link four or five or more fruits for awesome fruit-rescuing power-ups!, Making long link of fruits gives you a blaster. Blasters are awesome, and clear more same color of fruits at a time as possible to get the most points and free blasters.

- 8 types of fruit with different colors which is automatically generated at random
- Awesome graphical interface
- Funny Animations
- 84 attractive levels, The challenging scores increase 200 at each levels.
- There are special items: iced fruit, explosive fruit, horizon and vertical fruit, and other interesting items.
- Works great offline as well.
- Free to play

Fruit World Splash is great animations beautiful design and best free game, So download and link to match the fruit and win.
